sentences.sContent: I bathed, washed my hair, and got dressed.
sentences.sCn: 我洗了澡，洗了头，然后穿上衣服。

sentences.sContent: He bathed the children and put them to bed.
sentences.sCn: 他给孩子们洗了澡，然后把他们弄上床。

sentences.sContent: They bathed in the lake in the moonlight.
sentences.sCn: 月光下，他们在湖里游泳。

sentences.sContent: She brought a bowl of water and began to bathe the injured arm.
sentences.sCn: 她拿来一盆水，开始清洗受伤的手臂。

phrases.pCn: [主英国英语] 去洗一次海(或河、湖)水浴；去游泳

trans.tranCn: 洗澡；给…洗；游泳；浸洗; 浸泡
trans.tranOther: to wash yourself or someone else in a bath
